title: Probability Rules
text: To find the probability of our situation, we first need to find out how many office workers we can choose from.

title: Total Employees Not Going Out
text: How many employees do not go to an establishment during lunch time?

title: Probability Rules
text: Next, we need to find the amount of employees that correspond to our initial condition.

title: Total Non-Eaters
text: How many employees do not eat lunch?

title: Answer
text: To find our answer, we can take our first proportion and divide it by our second to get the probability. What is our final answer?
